name: Unknown Fate
description: Unknown Fate is an enigmatic story-driven action adventure set in a surreal world full of mind-twisting puzzles and bizarre creatures
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 处理器: Intel Core 2 Duo, 2.2 GHz 内存: 4 GB RAM 图形: GeForce GT 430, Radeon HD 5400 or HD4000, 1GB VRAM; 1280 x 720 resolution DirectX 版本: 9.0c 存储空间: 需要 8 GB 可用空间 声卡: Compatible with DirectX®: 9.0c
